text:
SCHOLARSHIPS (Continued)
Page 2
Applications should be mailed to Dr. Harry Skornia, Executive Director, NAEB,
14 Gregory Hall, Urbana, Illinois, and must be received not later than June 5,
1954. Successful applicants will be notified by June 14, 1954.
Important Note to Applicant: Please indicate conspicuously at the top of
application whether you are applying for TV Production Workshop. TV Engineering
Workshop. or a Scholarship.
